comment._content: Is it possible that I might have the original . . . I have an 8 x 10 and it looks original . . .

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/30227146@N07] That's interesting! Our pic appears to be a photograph of a postcard. I don't know if you saw the link to the book on the replica and its journey (published 1893) but the same image appears on page 8. Would be great to locate the original!
